mapper.insert: INSERT INTO atcl_info( atcl_idx, usr_id, high_atcl_idx, atcl_sbjt, atcl_conts, cmpny_nm, prcs_stus, reg_date, atcl_stus ) VALUES ( (nextval('public.atcl_idx_seq')), #{usr_id}, #{high_atcl_idx}, #{atcl_sbjt}, #{atcl_conts}, #{cmpny_nm}, #{prcs_stus}, #{reg_date}, #{atcl_stus} )
mapper.select: SELECT * from ATCL_INFO ORDER BY atcl_idx DESC OFFSET #{atcl_offset} LIMIT #{atcl_limit}
SELECT * from atcl_info WHERE prcs_stus = #{prcs_stus} ORDER BY atcl_idx DESC OFFSET #{atcl_offset} LIMIT #{atcl_limit}
SELECT count(*) WHERE prcs_stus = #{prcs_stus} OFFSET #{atcl_offset} LIMIT #{atcl_limit}
